amendment.description: To compute the actuarial value of monthly benefits in the form of a life annuity commencing at age 60 for certain airline pilots.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2583 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 41. Record Vote Number: 327.

action.text: Amendment SA 2583 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S12892-12897, S12905-12906; text: CR S12892) To compute the actuarial value of monthly benefits in the form of a life annuity commencing at age 60 for certain airline pilots.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2583 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 41. Record Vote Number: 327.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2583 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 41. Record Vote Number: 327.
